tr_quotes.quote: Bitişleri yeni başlangıçlara öncülük ettiği için kutlayın.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

tr_quotes.quote: Bu değişim dünyasında, gelen hiçbir şey kalmaz ve giden hiçbir şey kaybolmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anne Sophie Swetchine

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbinizi değiştirerek hayatınızı değiştirirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: John Porter

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklüğümüz, dünyayı yeniden yaratabilmemizden daha ziyade kendimizi yeniden yaratabilmemizdedir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Değişim sabırsızlar için bir süreç değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Barbara Reinhold

tr_quotes.quote: Yardım eden bir el bulabileceğiniz en iyi yer, kendi kolunuzun ucudur.
tr_quotes.author: İsveç Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Şu an ne olduğunu, bugüne kadar ne olduğun; ileride ne olacağını, şu an yaptığın belirler.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Değişim, ancak içeriden açılabilen bir kapıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Terry Neil

tr_quotes.quote: Olabileceğiniz şeyi olmak için asla çok geç değildir.
tr_quotes.author: George Eliot

tr_quotes.quote: İki sebepten dolayı değişirsiniz: Ya yeterince öğrendiğinizden değişmek ister, ya da yeterince incindiğinizden değişmek zorunda kalırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşam sanatı kendini sürekli olarak etrafındakilere adapte etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Kazuko Okokaura

tr_quotes.quote: Ekildiğin yerde büyü.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Eşsiz olarak doğdun. Bir kopya olarak ölme.
tr_quotes.author: John Mason

tr_quotes.quote: Değişimi yaratmazsan, değişim seni yaratacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sonuçlara odaklanırsan asla değişemezsin. Değişime odaklanırsan sonuç alırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Jack Dixon

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün bir yolculuktur ve yolculuğun kendisi yuvadır.
tr_quotes.author: Basho

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı insanlar büyük ve etkileyici değişim arzu ederler. Bazı insanlar yavaş ve sağlam bir rotayı tercih eder. Senin için doğru olanı yap.
tr_quotes.author: Julie Morgenstern

tr_quotes.quote: Değiştiğimizde her şey değişir.
tr_quotes.author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek bir diyalogda iki taraf da değişmeye isteklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Aklınızı düzeltirseniz, hayatınızın taşları yerine oturur.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuz eşsizdir. O bizim uyanışımızın aracıdır. Ona iyi bakın.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta başlıca iki seçim vardır: koşulları olduğu gibi kabul etmek, ya da onları değiştirme sorumluluğunu kabul etmek .
tr_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey bir günde değişebilir ve o da belki bugündür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız unutulmuş şeyler; yenidir.
tr_quotes.author: Rose Bertin

tr_quotes.quote: Her kim değişimi reddederse çürümeye mahkûmdur.
tr_quotes.author: Harold Wilson

tr_quotes.quote: Beğenilen şeyler ya yeni, ya da gerçekten yüksektir.
tr_quotes.author: Hollanda Özdeyişi

tr_quotes.quote: Her an değiştirmeliyiz. Yenilenmeli, gençleştirmeliyiz kendimizi; yoksa katılaşırız.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Yenilik vardır ki sağlam, eskiler vardır ki çürük değildir.
tr_quotes.author: M.Selahattin Şimşek

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların en çok korktuğu şey yeni bir adım atmak, yeni bir söz söylemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni çareler uygulamayan, yeni belalar beklemelidir; çünkü zaman en büyük yenilikçi.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: İlericilik, yeniliğe düşman halkı yenilikçi yapma mücadelesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Yalçın Küçük

tr_quotes.quote: Benim maksadım kargaşa yaratmak değildir ben sadece zamanı değiştirme çabasındayım.
tr_quotes.author: Aamir Khan

tr_quotes.quote: Dünle beraber gitti cancağızım, ne kadar söz varsa düne ait, şimdi yeni şeyler söylemek lazım.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey bütün bütün yeni değildir. Özgünlük bir etkiden doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Pierre Gxotte

tr_quotes.quote: Rekabet dünyasında iki seçeneğiniz vardır. Kaybedebilirsiniz. Ya da kazanmak istiyorsanız, değişirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Lester C. Thurow

tr_quotes.quote: Yaptığımız şeyler kadar yapamadıklarımızdan da gurur duyuyorum. Yenilik bin şeye hayır demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Türk milletinin istidadı ve kesin kararı, medeniyet yolunda durmadan, yılmadan ilerlemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kazandığın başarılarda takılı kal ne de hatalarında ısrar et. Bunların yerine tekrar başla; şimdinin her değerli anında yeniden başla.
tr_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşayacak yenilikler, ancak eskiyi bilenlerden çıkar.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Şahabettin

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcılık” yeni şeyler düşünmek, “Yenilik” yeni şeyler yapmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Levitt

tr_quotes.quote: Yenilikler, ancak onlar için yer açtığınız zaman yaşantınıza girebilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Marlo Morgan

tr_quotes.quote: Yeniliğinden daha yeni, yeniliğinden hiçbir şey yitirmeyenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Ali Suad

tr_quotes.quote: Sen değişirsen, şansın da değişir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer zihnimi değiştirirsem, etrafımdaki dünyayı ve sorunlarını algılayışımı da değiştiririm.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Chandler

tr_quotes.quote: Değişmeyen tek şey, değişimin kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Heraclitus

tr_quotes.quote: Herhangi bir yerden veya her yerden başlayabiliriz. Yeter ki orada bir değişim olsun ve bu benimle başlasın.
tr_quotes.author: M. Ferguson

tr_quotes.quote: Şeyler ne kadar değişirlerse, o kadar aynı kalırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Alphonce Karr

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyler değiştirmek isteyen insan önce kendinden başlamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Sokrates

tr_quotes.quote: Rüzgarın yönünü değiştiremediğinde, yelkenlerini rüzgara göre ayarla.
tr_quotes.author: Xsentius

tr_quotes.quote: Her değişim daima başka değişimlere ihtiyaç gösterir.
tr_quotes.author: Niccola Machieavelli

en_quotes.quote: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused
en_quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes if you want to see a change for the better, you have to take things into your own hands
en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: My personality is that I like to express myself, and that is not something I will look to change
en_quotes.author: Dele Alli

en_quotes.quote: I'm like a tree. My leaves might change color, but my roots are the same
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But, nothing is as painful as staying stuck where you do not belong
en_quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

en_quotes.quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude
en_quotes.author: Charles Revson

en_quotes.quote: Your surroundings may change but your essence and your personality pretty much stay the same
en_quotes.author: Jenna Dewan

en_quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Creative thinking inspires ideas. Ideas inspire change
en_quotes.author: Barbara Januszkiewicz

en_quotes.quote: Climate change is the environmental challenge of this generation, and it is imperative that we act before it's too late
en_quotes.author: John Delaney

en_quotes.quote: One good teacher in a lifetime may sometimes change a delinquent into a solid citizen
en_quotes.author: Philip Wylie

en_quotes.quote: I know my soul is beautiful; I know I'm a good person. And that will never change for me
en_quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Ignorance is always afraid of change
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: As a leader, the first person I need to lead is me. The first person that I should try to change is me
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing permanent except change
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: The world is not a static place. People change, evolve
en_quotes.author: Mahesh Bhatt

en_quotes.quote: It's always good to change and keep things fresh, whether it's a hairstyle or wardrobe
en_quotes.author: Sheamus

en_quotes.quote: Empathy is the starting point for creating a community and taking action. It's the impetus for creating change
en_quotes.author: Max Carver

en_quotes.quote: A change of environment is pretty refreshing
en_quotes.author: Owen Farrell

en_quotes.quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: One thing modeling taught me is that the spotlight can change everything
en_quotes.author: Liya Kebede

en_quotes.quote: The way to change the world is through individual responsibility and taking local action in your own community
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

en_quotes.quote: With only one bag, you can change your outfit completely
en_quotes.author: Sonia Rykiel

en_quotes.quote: The good and bad things are what form us as people... change makes us grow
en_quotes.author: Kate Winslet

en_quotes.quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Climate change is a terrible problem, and it absolutely needs to be solved. It deserves to be a huge priority
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

en_quotes.quote: A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: Asking questions is the first way to begin change
en_quotes.author: Kubra Sait

en_quotes.quote: You want to be the pebble in the pond that creates the ripple for change
en_quotes.author: Tim Cook

en_quotes.quote: I benefit from a change of scenery; it's always inspiring
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vile

en_quotes.quote: Excellent firms don't believe in excellence - only in constant improvement and constant change
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: The rules of survival never change, whether you're in a desert or in an arena
en_quotes.author: Bear Grylls

en_quotes.quote: What's dangerous is not to evolve
en_quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

en_quotes.quote: If you get stuck, draw with a different pen. Change your tools; it may free your thinking
en_quotes.author: Paul Arden

en_quotes.quote: How can people change their minds about us if they don't know who we are?
en_quotes.author: Harvey Milk

en_quotes.quote: Change comes from reflection
en_quotes.author: Genesis P-Orridge

en_quotes.quote: As engineers, we were going to be in a position to change the world - not just study it
en_quotes.author: Henry Petroski

en_quotes.quote: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: People can change, learn, and grow, and it's better to face your demons instead of perpetually running away from them
en_quotes.author: Jessica Rothe

en_quotes.quote: All your mannerisms change easily when you have inch-long acrylic nails
en_quotes.author: Margot Robbie

en_quotes.quote: Change is always good. It brings you to a new place
en_quotes.author: Lee Ranaldo

en_quotes.quote: It's not the destination that matters. It's the change of scene
en_quotes.author: Brian Eno

en_quotes.quote: It is really interesting to change your hair color after being blond your entire life
en_quotes.author: Ross Lynch

en_quotes.quote: If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirt
en_quotes.author: Francis Picabia

en_quotes.quote: A change of season calls for a change of scent that is both energizing and refreshing
en_quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

en_quotes.quote: Boxing is serious. It's not a game. Just one punch - change life
en_quotes.author: Gennady Golovkin

en_quotes.quote: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it
en_quotes.author: Allen Klein

en_quotes.quote: Never believe that a few caring people can't change the world. For, indeed, that's all who ever have
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: Aging gracefully means being flexible, being open, allowing change, enjoying change and loving yourself
en_quotes.author: Wendy Whelan

en_quotes.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world are the ones who do
en_quotes.author: John McAfee

en_quotes.quote: Adaptability is a great asset to have because life is so unpredictable, and things can change overnight for any of us
en_quotes.author: Chanda Kochhar

en_quotes.quote: A change of scenery can help everything
en_quotes.author: Drew Pomeranz

en_quotes.quote: The most important skill you need is the ability to learn how to change and grow
en_quotes.author: Scott Cook

en_quotes.quote: There is no question that climate change is happening; the only arguable point is what part humans are playing in it
en_quotes.author: David Attenborough

en_quotes.quote: I'm very interested in how people change
en_quotes.author: Nathan Englander

en_quotes.quote: I like to change. A new lamp, a piece of art, can transform a room
en_quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

en_quotes.quote: You don't change your style by changing your bag. You change it with your clothes
en_quotes.author: Stefano Gabbana

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if my hairstyles reflect that, but I am someone who enjoys change
en_quotes.author: Cobi Jones

en_quotes.quote: Whatever you do, be happy with you. Don't conform. You are who you are, and you shouldn't change that for anybody
en_quotes.author: Aimee Teegarden

en_quotes.quote: In true dialogue, both sides are willing to change
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Things don't have to change the world to be important
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: Hair color is the easiest way to change your appearance, but a bad dye job might draw more attention to you
en_quotes.author: Lisa Lutz

en_quotes.quote: I believe global warming and climate change are real threats to our planet
en_quotes.author: Andrew Cuomo

en_quotes.quote: Miracles happen everyday, change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you
en_quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

en_quotes.quote: A lot can change in the editing room
en_quotes.author: Diane Lane

en_quotes.quote: People change over the years, and that changes situations for good and for bad
en_quotes.author: Bobby Knight

en_quotes.quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: I was willing to accept what I couldn't change
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Face the facts of being what you are, for that is what changes what you are
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: On climate change, we often don't fully appreciate that it is a problem. We think it is a problem waiting to happen
en_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

en_quotes.quote: The blockchain is the financial challenge of our time. It is going to change the way that our financial world operates
en_quotes.author: Blythe Masters

en_quotes.quote: Once I find a bag that I love, I wear it always. I just don't change my bags. I literally find one and stay with it
en_quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

en_quotes.quote: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: Change, like sunshine, can be a friend or a foe, a blessing or a curse, a dawn or a dusk
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: People can cry much easier than they can change
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: One must change one's tactics every ten years if one wishes to maintain one's superiority
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: I change my mind a lot. I usually don't agree with what I say very much. I'm an awful liar
en_quotes.author: David Bowie

en_quotes.quote: I wake up every day in a different headspace, so on any given day, my hairstyle will change
en_quotes.author: Dawn Richard

en_quotes.quote: Logic will never change emotion or perception
en_quotes.author: Edward de Bono

en_quotes.quote: Whenever you're feeling moments of discomfort, that means true change is happening for you
en_quotes.author: John David Washington

en_quotes.quote: If you want to make enemies, try to change something
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: The first resistance to social change is to say it's not necessary
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Obviously, if I could go back and change anything, I would be a perfect man. And I know there's no perfect man
en_quotes.author: Allen Iverson

en_quotes.quote: To change ones life: Start immediately. Do it flamboyantly
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

en_quotes.quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily
en_quotes.author: Mike Murdock

en_quotes.quote: When we, as a nation, put our minds to something, when we truly choose to care about something, change always happens
en_quotes.author: Megan Rapinoe

en_quotes.quote: Don't ever forget that a small group of thoughtful people can change the world, it's the only thing that ever has
en_quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

en_quotes.quote: It takes but one person, one moment, one conviction, to start a ripple of change
en_quotes.author: Donna Brazile

en_quotes.quote: I believe people change. I think that they can learn from mistakes
en_quotes.author: Kevin Plank

en_quotes.quote: If you begin to understand what you are without trying to change it, then what you are undergoes a transformation
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes
en_quotes.author: Hugh Prather

en_quotes.quote: Like it or not, the world evolves, priorities change and so do you
en_quotes.author: Marilu Henner

en_quotes.quote: Repentance means you change your mind so deeply that it changes you
en_quotes.author: Bruce Wilkinson

en_quotes.quote: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself
en_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

en_quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Movement is life;' and it is well to be able to forget the past, and kill the present by continual change
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: In order to change the world, you have to get your head together first
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: It all happened the way it was supposed to. I wouldn't change anything. I had such a great run
en_quotes.author: Carol Burnett

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in the after life, although I am bringing a change of underwear
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: I was born not knowing and have had only a little time to change that here and there
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: Cinema is a mirror that can change the world
en_quotes.author: Diego Luna

en_quotes.quote: Each one of us can make a difference. Together we make change
en_quotes.author: Barbara Mikulski

en_quotes.quote: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the game
en_quotes.author: Randy Pausch

en_quotes.quote: Good intentions never change anything. They only become a deeper and deeper rut
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Company cultures are like country cultures. Never try to change one. Try, instead, to work with what you've got
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Progress is a nice word. But change is its motivator. And change has its enemies
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who does anything creative is always gonna want to change
en_quotes.author: Will Ferrell

en_quotes.quote: You can't change what happened. But you can still change what will happen
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Vettel

en_quotes.quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Small change, small wonders - these are the currency of my endurance and ultimately of my life
en_quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

en_quotes.quote: You can't think about things you want to change. Just be yourself
en_quotes.author: Ethan Embry

en_quotes.quote: If your life changes, we can change the world, too
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: The most useless are those who never change through the years
en_quotes.author: James M. Barrie

en_quotes.quote: Bravery is the engine of change
en_quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

en_quotes.quote: People don't realize that lighting can change the whole look of a place and the feel
en_quotes.author: Bobby Berk

en_quotes.quote: You can't change how people act, but what you can change is how you react
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Hammer

en_quotes.quote: I think you can change your belief, but sometimes your behavior takes a lot longer
en_quotes.author: Tara Westover

en_quotes.quote: You've got to change incentives for good behavior as opposed to just disincentivizing bad behavior
en_quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

en_quotes.quote: I still believe that if your aim is to change the world, journalism is a more immediate short-term weapon
en_quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

en_quotes.quote: First impressions matter. Most people don't change their political views radically from the ones they first hold
en_quotes.author: Bill Kristol

en_quotes.quote: A hero is someone right who doesn't change
en_quotes.author: George Foreman

en_quotes.quote: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being
en_quotes.author: Lech Walesa

en_quotes.quote: People are fed up with seeing the same thing over and over. They want a qualitative change
en_quotes.author: Amitabh Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: Change is always a little bit strange
en_quotes.author: Brendon Urie

en_quotes.quote: If you want to change the world, find someone to help you paddle
en_quotes.author: William H. McRaven

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing so stable as change
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: People change all the time
en_quotes.author: Tony Shalhoub

en_quotes.quote: The effects of climate change are real and must be acted on
en_quotes.author: Joe Biden

en_quotes.quote: If you're going to change things, you have to be with the people who hold the levers
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: No real social change has ever been brought about without a revolution... revolution is but thought carried into action
en_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

en_quotes.quote: It's time to bring a change because the world is changing. Let's open our minds and live in present
en_quotes.author: Qandeel Baloch

en_quotes.quote: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action
en_quotes.author: Stella Young

en_quotes.quote: Change your opinions, keep to your principles; change your leaves, keep intact your roots
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Be content with what you are, and wish not change; nor dread your last day, nor long for it
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Injuries obviously change the way you approach the game
en_quotes.author: Brett Favre

en_quotes.quote: People change their positions all the time, the way they change their wives
en_quotes.author: Michael Cohen

en_quotes.quote: A new car is not going to change your life
en_quotes.author: Monica Ali

en_quotes.quote: The need for change bulldozed a road down the center of my mind
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Being friends with anyone for 30 years is no easy task - people change, they drift apart, they move on
en_quotes.author: Alana Stewart

en_quotes.quote: If you want to change the world, start off by making your bed
en_quotes.author: William H. McRaven

en_quotes.quote: Certainly, there were tough times, but no, you can't go back and change it. So, why dwell on it?
en_quotes.author: Alex Smith

en_quotes.quote: That's why I want to change Mississippi. You don't run away from problems - you just face them
en_quotes.author: Fannie Lou Hamer

en_quotes.quote: The question is not whether we are able to change but whether we are changing fast enough
en_quotes.author: Angela Merkel

en_quotes.quote: There are good and bad times, but our mood changes more often than our fortune
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: The ability to change constantly and effectively is made easier by high-level continuity
en_quotes.author: Michael Porter

en_quotes.quote: Lighting is a good way to change the look of a place without spending much
en_quotes.author: Bobby Berk

en_quotes.quote: Actually, I'm 5-8 and change without shoes. With shoes, 5-9
en_quotes.author: Nate Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Climate change is moving faster than we are, but we don't give up because we know that climate action is the only path
en_quotes.author: Antonio Guterres

en_quotes.quote: That's something we real big on - just being real, authentic, being yourself, not letting this lifestyle change you
en_quotes.author: YG

en_quotes.quote: Words are powerful; if you change your words, you can change your life
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Voting is the only way to make change in a democracy
en_quotes.author: Christine Todd Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Nothing endures but change
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: I'm a Gemini, so I change my mind every day
en_quotes.author: Natalie Portman

en_quotes.quote: I think there are certain ways that people are always themselves, but I do think people change
en_quotes.author: Mike White

en_quotes.quote: Change is inevitable. Change for the better is a full-time job
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: I may be a living legend, but that sure don't help when I've got to change a flat tire
en_quotes.author: Roy Orbison

en_quotes.quote: The robots are coming, whether we like it or not, and will change our economy in dramatic ways
en_quotes.author: Kristen Soltis Anderson

en_quotes.quote: Relentless, repetitive self talk is what changes our self-image
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: The world is changing very fast. Big will not beat small anymore. It will be the fast beating the slow
en_quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: People change, they grow
en_quotes.author: Jacob Young

en_quotes.quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances
en_quotes.author: Jackie Chan

en_quotes.quote: Change is hard and requires constant struggle and determination
en_quotes.author: Sadiq Khan

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, when you have to deal with a whole country, priorities change
en_quotes.author: Toby Regbo

en_quotes.quote: If we don't change direction soon, we'll end up where we're going
en_quotes.author: Irwin Corey

en_quotes.quote: Change is inevitable. Change is constant
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Without change, something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens. The sleeper must awaken
en_quotes.author: Frank Herbert

en_quotes.quote: When you are through changing, you are through
en_quotes.author: Bruce Barton

en_quotes.quote: Yes, I tried to change the classical style in a way that people who don't understand it can enjoy
en_quotes.author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan

en_quotes.quote: Everything can change at any moment, suddenly and forever
en_quotes.author: Paul Auster

en_quotes.quote: Some programming languages manage to absorb change, but withstand progress
en_quotes.author: Alan Perlis

en_quotes.quote: There's no reason to change what you are, but if you're not being you, then you need to acknowledge that
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

en_quotes.quote: You're only as young as the last time you changed your mind
en_quotes.author: Timothy Leary

en_quotes.quote: Good leaders make sense of change in the world... then imparts that insight to the team
en_quotes.author: Dan Pena

en_quotes.quote: I don't think there's a major change between runway and real life anymore
en_quotes.author: Francois Nars

en_quotes.quote: When you blame others, you give up your power to change
en_quotes.author: Robert Anthony

en_quotes.quote: People change. I wouldn't like to be accountable for the interviews I've done, or the person I was when I was 20, 21
en_quotes.author: Robbie Williams

en_quotes.quote: I just don't believe that you have to come in and insult people when you want to change things
en_quotes.author: Sydney Schanberg

en_quotes.quote: If something is good, it's always good. You don't have to change it
en_quotes.author: Tony Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I try to contrast; life today is full of contrast... We have to change
en_quotes.author: Gianni Versace

en_quotes.quote: I'm all about change, and I know things are going to move forward in life, and that's just how it goes
en_quotes.author: Kid Rock

en_quotes.quote: We can't create change until we recognize and check our own actions
en_quotes.author: Ashley Graham

en_quotes.quote: Just because everything is different doesn't mean anything has changed
en_quotes.author: Irene Peter

en_quotes.quote: If you're going to vote yes and change the law. You have to know what's in it. You can't depend on other people
en_quotes.author: Justin Amash

en_quotes.quote: Heat of blood makes young people change their inclinations often, and habit makes old ones keep to theirs a great while
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: No one person can change the world, but one and one and one add up
en_quotes.author: Sylvie Guillem

en_quotes.quote: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: A leopard does not change his spots, or change his feeling that spots are rather a credit
en_quotes.author: Ivy Compton-Burnett

en_quotes.quote: Things do not change; we change
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: The way to bring about change is to be proactive and active
en_quotes.author: Octavia Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Change is vital, improvement the logical form of change
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Change in all things is sweet
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Don't change on me. Don't extort me unless you intend to do it forever
en_quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

en_quotes.quote: India is home, and that's never going to change
en_quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

en_quotes.quote: I think daughters can change the perception of their fathers
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is Nature's delight
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Shoes can change an outfit
en_quotes.author: Tina Knowles

en_quotes.quote: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change
en_quotes.author: Carl Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Everyone should change; otherwise, you can't grow as a person in life
en_quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

en_quotes.quote: I think AIDS can be won. I think we can win this fight. It is winnable. But it means behavior change
en_quotes.author: Franklin Graham

en_quotes.quote: There are many things we do not want about the world. Let us not just mourn them. Let us change them
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Marcos

en_quotes.quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: The Titanic hit the iceberg not because they could not see it coming but because they could not change direction
en_quotes.author: Dean Devlin

en_quotes.quote: He who is fixed to a star does not change his mind
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: There are two kinds of fools: those who can't change their opinions and those who won't
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: You have to change the set, stay ahead of the curve
en_quotes.author: Carson Daly

en_quotes.quote: It is never too late to change the way you eat - once you do, your body will thank you with a longer and healthier life
en_quotes.author: David H. Murdock

en_quotes.quote: If I have to change my lifestyle, I don't want to live
en_quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

en_quotes.quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone
en_quotes.author: Alicia Witt

en_quotes.quote: We have to evolve, we have to change, and in order to do that, we have to initiate the change
en_quotes.author: Edwin Catmull

en_quotes.quote: And Seaman, just like a falling oak, manages to change direction
en_quotes.author: John Motson

en_quotes.quote: I'm not going to change; I'm going to keep grinding. I'm going to do all I can to win
en_quotes.author: Ezekiel Elliott

en_quotes.quote: One change always leaves the way open for the establishment of others
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: Let the great world spin for ever down the ringing grooves of change
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: To change what you get, you must change who you are
en_quotes.author: Vernon Howard

en_quotes.quote: Change is hard, but change is good
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: If you have an opportunity to help others or incite change, it feels like a moral obligation to do so
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Chambers

en_quotes.quote: I literally change my phone number 10 times a year and I don't ever save my contacts
en_quotes.author: Rob Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: I pretty much use the same stuff live that I use in the studio. I don't like the feel to change too much
en_quotes.author: Joey Jordison

en_quotes.quote: Like the Internet, Bitcoin will change the way people interact and do business around the world
en_quotes.author: Erik Voorhees

en_quotes.quote: He that will not apply new remedies must expect new evils; for time is the greatest innovator
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: The Marines was a fresh start - that is why they shave your head. I wish they would let you change your name
en_quotes.author: Drew Carey

en_quotes.quote: Very often a change of self is needed more than a change of scene
en_quotes.author: A. C. Benson

en_quotes.quote: Things of this world are in so constant a flux, that nothing remains long in the same state
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: Most people already know what they're doing wrong. When I get them to church I want to tell them that you can change
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Lord, where we are wrong, make us willing to change; where we are right, make us easy to live with
en_quotes.author: Peter Marshall

en_quotes.quote: All change means disorganization of the old and organization of the new
en_quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

en_quotes.quote: Friendships that have stood the test of time and change are surely best
en_quotes.author: Joseph Parry

en_quotes.quote: People got insights into what was bothering them, but they hardly did a damn thing to change
en_quotes.author: Albert Ellis

en_quotes.quote: You have to modernise; you have to change - you can't just be traditional for the fun of being traditional
en_quotes.author: Richard Rogers

en_quotes.quote: I can't change the past. It made me what I am
en_quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

en_quotes.quote: The things you cannot change you can't waste your time on
en_quotes.author: Fernando Torres

en_quotes.quote: I change, like every single normal person
en_quotes.author: Kevin Pietersen

en_quotes.quote: In a progressive country change is constant; change is inevitable
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: All things are only transitory
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: A small behavioral change can also lead to embracing a wider checklist of healthier choices
en_quotes.author: Chuck Norris

en_quotes.quote: I like working with people. I believe change can only come through collaboration
en_quotes.author: Alain de Botton

en_quotes.quote: We'll try and be very aggressive, we'll try and speed up and change gears, and we'll see who's going to win
en_quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

en_quotes.quote: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery
en_quotes.author: Harold Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Progressive, radical, or even revolutionary change has always come from below
en_quotes.author: Tom Morello

en_quotes.quote: In football, the good thing is things can change in a second
en_quotes.author: Didier Drogba

en_quotes.quote: If you knew you could change your lifestyle and diet and avoid heart disease and other things, you should do it
en_quotes.author: Laila Ali

en_quotes.quote: The point of the essay is to change things
en_quotes.author: Edward Tufte

en_quotes.quote: Change is the only constant. Hanging on is the only sin
en_quotes.author: Denise McCluggage

en_quotes.quote: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Things alter for the worse spontaneously, if they be not altered for the better designedly
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Remember that life's big changes rarely give advance warning
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: In times of rapid change, experience could be your worst enemy
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: I think you should always bear in mind that entropy is not on your side
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: All things must change to something new, to something strange
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: If you want to change the world - I do - you have to start with yourself
en_quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

en_quotes.quote: The world of marketing has changed. You can lead the change or be a victim of change
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: My phone blows up all the time. I had to change my number
en_quotes.author: Calvin Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The more things change, the more they are the same
en_quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

en_quotes.quote: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different
en_quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

en_quotes.quote: Time is change; we measure its passing by how much things alter
en_quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

en_quotes.quote: Looking inward and understanding where you made mistakes in the past helps you set up for change
en_quotes.author: Steve Ells

en_quotes.quote: Change and renewal are themes in life, aren't they? We keep growing throughout life
en_quotes.author: Susan Minot

en_quotes.quote: All I want to do is change the world
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Opinions are made to be changed - or how is truth to be got at?
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Change alone is unchanging
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: I want to change the perception about Latinos worldwide. I think people don't know yet how cool we are
en_quotes.author: J Balvin

en_quotes.quote: Change brings opportunity
en_quotes.author: Nido Qubein

en_quotes.quote: It is not necessary to change. Survival is not mandatory
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: Not only is women's work never done, the definition keeps changing
en_quotes.author: Bill Copeland

en_quotes.quote: The garden is growth and change and that means loss as well as constant new treasures to make up for a few disasters
en_quotes.author: May Sarton

en_quotes.quote: You can be a catalyst for change but change never really entirely happens just because of one guy
en_quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

en_quotes.quote: Weep not that the world changes - did it keep a stable, changeless state, it were cause indeed to weep
en_quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

en_quotes.quote: Change is such hard work
en_quotes.author: Billy Crystal

en_quotes.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better
en_quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

en_quotes.quote: Everything in life that we really accept undergoes a change
en_quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

en_quotes.quote: Any change, even a change for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts
en_quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if you can change things, but it's a drop in the ocean
en_quotes.author: Julie Walters

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who thinks there's safety in numbers hasn't looked at the stock market pages
en_quotes.author: Irene Peter

en_quotes.quote: The world changes in direct proportion to the number of people willing to be honest about their lives
en_quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

en_quotes.quote: Every generation is gonna keep changing, and you just have to embrace the change
en_quotes.author: Wyclef Jean

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever
en_quotes.author: Keri Russell

en_quotes.quote: Grass-roots work is not flashy, and rarely celebrated on the national media level, but that is where change begins
en_quotes.author: Ilyasah Shabazz

en_quotes.quote: In not my, but our collective hands, is held the promise of change
en_quotes.author: Mark Sanford

en_quotes.quote: Taste may change, but inclination never
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: The foolish and the dead alone never change their opinions
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: Change occurs in direct proportion to dissatisfaction, but dissatisfaction never changes
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: Excuses change nothing, but make everyone feel better
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Because things are the way they are, things will not stay the way they are
en_quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

en_quotes.quote: Illness strikes men when they are exposed to change
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: Christians are supposed not merely to endure change, nor even to profit by it, but to cause it
en_quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

en_quotes.quote: What we call progress is the exchange of one nuisance for another nuisance
en_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

en_quotes.quote: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet
en_quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

en_quotes.quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living
en_quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

en_quotes.quote: If you want to change attitudes, start with a change in behavior
en_quotes.author: William Glasser

en_quotes.quote: When it becomes more difficult to suffer than to change... you will change
en_quotes.author: Robert Anthony

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people get impatient with the pace of change
en_quotes.author: James Levine

en_quotes.quote: As with anything creative, change is inevitable
en_quotes.author: Enya

en_quotes.quote: I shall not change my course because those who assume to be better than I desire it
en_quotes.author: Victoria Woodhull

en_quotes.quote: Change is not only likely, it's inevitable
en_quotes.author: Barbara Sher

en_quotes.quote: The main dangers in this life are the people who want to change everything... or nothing
en_quotes.author: Nancy Astor

en_quotes.quote: If you can change three lives in 10, three lives in a hundred, that's got to be good, hasn't it?
en_quotes.author: Ian Botham

en_quotes.quote: The moral world is as little exempt as the physical world from the law of ceaseless change, of perpetual flux
en_quotes.author: James G. Frazer

en_quotes.quote: Change is tough, people don't like it, but it is necessary. Take two aspirins and call me in the morning
en_quotes.author: Christopher Bond

en_quotes.quote: If you want to change the culture, you will have to start by changing the organization
en_quotes.author: Mary Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Perfection is immutable. But for things imperfect, change is the way to perfect them
en_quotes.author: Owen Feltham

en_quotes.quote: If you feel like it's difficult to change, you will probably have a harder time succeeding
en_quotes.author: Andrea Jung

en_quotes.quote: Change means that what was before wasn't perfect. People want things to be better
en_quotes.author: Esther Dyson

en_quotes.quote: Our fathers valued change for the sake of its results; we value it in the act
en_quotes.author: Alice Meynell

en_quotes.quote: Serve the dinner backward, do anything - but for goodness sake, do something weird
en_quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell
